update control
`name` = #{name},
nickname = #{nickname},
`code` = #{code},
`clazzId` = #{clazzId},
`sort` = #{sort},
updateBy = #{updateBy}, updateDt = #{updateDt}
WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select control.*, clazz.name AS clazzName from control LEFT JOIN clazz ON control.clazzId = clazz.id
control.rowStatus = 1 AND clazz.rowStatus = 1
and control.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{controlName}),'%')
and clazz.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{controlClass}),'%')
order BY control.id desc
